participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a love for music and philosophy.
participant_1.background: I think my family would be supportive because they are accepting of people who are different. I live with my paps and grandma. I grew up in Alabama. I like to play guitar. I study philosophy at Mass.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Passionate about art and photography, Sophie is a dreamer who enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_2.background: I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects. I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in. I do not like my job. I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather. I enjoy a nice cup of coffee while listening to records on my record player.

content.text: What are you up to today?
Nothing much, just working on some photography projects.
Nice! What kind of photography do you like to do?
I love taking pictures of landscapes and nature.
That sounds cool. I live in Alabama so I have a lot of beautiful landscapes to photograph.
I'm jealous! I live in a city so there's not much nature around.
I would love to! I've never been to Alabama before.
You'd love it here! We have some of the best beaches in the country.
I love the beach! I'm definitely going to have to come visit soon.
You're welcome to stay with me!
That would be great! Thanks for the offer!
No problem! We can go fishing and swimming and everything.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I can't wait to visit.
